wikipedia_page.main: Eric Wilberforce Broadbridge, 2nd Baron Broadbridge (22 December 1895 – 18 November 1972) was a hereditary peer and businessman.

response: * Eric Broadbridge, 2nd Baron Broadbridge, hereditary peer

The son of Eric Broadbridge, 2nd Baron Broadbridge, he was educated at Hurstpierpoint College and St Catherine's College, Oxford.‘BROADBRIDGE’, Who Was Who, A & C Black, an imprint of Bloomsbury Publishing plc, 1920–2014
